text: The Wind Energy Holding Bangkok Open is a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Bangkok, Thailand, since 2016. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Blaž Kavčič || Go Soeda || 6–0, 1–0 ret. |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Kittipong Wachiramanowong || Sanchai Ratiwatana Sonchat Ratiwatana || 7–6(11–9), 6–3 |} Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Thailand
title: Wind Energy Holding Bangkok Open
